name: Lion's Mane (Hericium erinaceus)
description: Medicinal mushroom with unique neurotrophic properties. Contains hericenones and erinacines that stimulate Nerve Growth Factor (NGF) synthesis â€” the only known natural compounds to do so. Supports neurogenesis, cognition, and may protect against neurodegeneration.

dosage.notes: Dual extract (hot water + alcohol) captures both hericenones and erinacines. Fruiting body + mycelium combined preferred. Take consistently for 4+ weeks for cognitive effects.

keyFindings: Improved cognitive function in mild cognitive impairment (Mori et al., double-blind RCT)

Reduced anxiety and depression scores in menopausal women
